website_summaries.verdict: Natural formula to boost energy, metabolism, and brain function. Contains key vitamins, herbs and minerals – and iodine – for thyroid health.
pros: Highly rated for increasing energy, without the jitters, and decreasing food cravings
Even lifted depression for some.Safe to take in combination with prescription thyroid medication
cons: Not ideal for people with food allergies
Some experienced heartburn due to cayenne content but received a full refund due to guarantee

customer_reviews.title: Thyroid support!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi Everyone, My name is Rose. It will be a month on the 12 since I started taking this supplement. It really works for me. I am 65 and was diagnosed with Hashimoto. I have been taking Synthroid but still felt sluggish, tired and was gaining weight and losing my hair. Since I started taking this supplement I feel a lot more energy but I have also been losing weight. My hair issue is getting better. Helps my nails as well. Over all good a supplement to take.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa  Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: I this after consulting a nutritionalist, thinking I need ...
customer_reviews.text: I this after consulting a nutritionalist, thinking I need to CLEANSE my system. She suggested to try a thyroid support to help with my sluggishness eventhough my thyroid tests were normal. Immediate change....no napping in afternoon. Then I ran out and we were traveling. Within a few weeks, I was feeling tired again (I play tennis almost daily).....bought a new bottle and viola' big difference! PS I'm 61 years old
customer_reviews.author: barb j

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I take Synthroid and use to take Thyrosol supplements. When I had an ultrasound on my thyroid 6 months ago, my thyroid was huge and I had nodules that were close to the size to be biopsied. I went to buy more Thyrosol on Amazon and saw this product. It was much cheaper. So I compared the ingredients. This is far superior. I bought this and used it for 6 months. I just had another ultrasound and my thyroid is back to its normal size and the nodules have shrunk to minimal size. I am sticking with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane in CA

customer_reviews.title: and since using it I have felt a million times better. I've lost 10 lbs with no other changes ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been having problems related to my thyroid for a while.. Tired, irritable, weight gain.. You name it, I probably had it. I started using this support formula a few months ago, and since using it I have felt a million times better. I've lost 10 lbs with no other changes made to my lifestyle!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this Thyroid supplement for several months. I take it in combination with Levoxythrine, a prescription medicine for hypothyroidism. Before I took Thyroid Support formula, I suffered from fatigue, depression and weight gain. After 60 days of taking this herbal formula, the symptoms were lessening and I felt more energy. My depression lifted and I could exercise and drop the weight I gained. I continue taking this supplement because it works in combination with the prescription medicine. I'm thankful to have my aliveness and energy back!
customer_reviews.author: Artemis Bets

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: If you're a female over the age of 30 and have gained weight mysteriously or are feeling sluggish, this is for you. We were lucky enough to have access to a regenerative medicine specialist who recommended this but realize that many of our friends don't in some remote parts of the country. Things change in the female body after a certain age, plain and simple. But some of these fixes for feeling more radiant and more alive are as simple as taking this thyroid support.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Really Does Work!
customer_reviews.text: These thyroid support supplements were pretty good and I started noticing an increase in my energy about 2 weeks after taking them. I can also say that was also helps with these supplements is eating a well balanced meal and living a healthy lifestyle which I started adopting 3 months ago and I can honestly say that it works. I know the supplements contributed to it because you need energy to workout and I can say that these supplements allows me to sustain my energy throughout the day without feeling sluggish. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: SPatterson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Having hypothyroidism is a struggle. Being tired all the time and lack of focus were my biggest struggle. I went to the doctor time and time again, but medication adjustments nor b12 shots helped. I came accross this supplement while looking for green tea and decided to give it a try. I AM SOOOO GLAD I DID!!!! I take this with my synthroid and within half an hour I have a surge of energy that lasts all day!!!!! My focus is amazing too. I can now multitask...and no crash at the end of the day. The capsules are a little big but I don't mind. Thete is no after taste either. I sincerely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetlips822

customer_reviews.title: Great little pick me up
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Thyroid Support for a month. I tried the recommended dosage of two tablets daily, however have found I prefer just one in the afternoon following lunch. Thyroid Support Complex provides a smooth energy boost, without the shakes or jitters found in energy drinks. As I have no thyroid, this supplement kicks in gently and I don't notice a tired or worn down feeling as artificial hormones are wearing off. I recommend this product for a great little pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: BIG

customer_reviews.title: This product was delivered on time and well packaged. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered on time and well packaged. From the first dose I experienced calmness and a sense of well-being; soon after I developed a nagging headache! I decided to take it a couple more days just to get it in my system, I noticed each time after roughly four hours of taking it I would develop a nagging headache! After four days of taking this product and enduring the nagging headaches, I decided to take my blood pressure! Yes, this product elevated my blood pressure tremendously; I don't advise anyone suffering from high blood pressure to take this product!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Holiday

customer_reviews.title: I'm noticing a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been inconsistent in taking this, which has been helpful because I really notice the difference when I'm taking it vs. when I'm not. Even though my thyroid is considered normal, I have felt sluggish and struggled with weight for the past few years. This gives me more energy and allows me to sleep better. I also feel "energetically hopeful." In other words, I feel hopeful about my day, whereas before I dragged through. I am grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from hypothyroidism and take medication, still I feel the effects of feeling sluggish tired confused and drained. I have tried everything in the book and nothing has helped as much as these supplements!!! Such a spur of energy makes me feel so good, not gittery this product is amazing!!! I take my supplements every day and can tell the difference of energy when u don't take it I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: autonomous

customer_reviews.title: Actually Effective Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I had tried another brand of Thyroid supplement, but it didn't seem to do anything. With this brand, I felt the effects quickly (definitely pay attention to the "take with food" recommendation because it works fast). I hate swallowing pills, but these are manageable with water. Because they're fairly potent, I started just taking one pill a day instead of two to help support diet and exercise to boost thyroid function. Hands are less cold after a few days and I quickly lost my double chin after starting the regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Big change
customer_reviews.text: Thyroid issues run in my family. I have felt tired, not in a great mood, and loosing my hair. I have been to the dr. several times and my blood work always comes back fine, but I know there is something else going on. I started taking this 2 months ago and I am not as tired and feel better. My hair is not falling out like it was and is starting to grow back.I have had 2 people comment on my hair looking thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Ash2011

customer_reviews.title: Feeling the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second bottle of Nature Wellness Thyroid Support and I can honestly feel the difference in my overall energy. I started taking this particular thyroid supplement because of the recommended daily ingredients needed to support the thyroid from Dr. Axe matches the daily value provided in this brand!
customer_reviews.author: ZellerGirl

customer_reviews.title: The Product I’ve Been Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Nature’s Wellness Thyroid Support is the very product I’ve been looking for. Ever since my thyroid issues started I always seemed drained & depressed (no matter how many changes they made to my Synthroid dosage). After being on your product I finally feel like the old me I once knew. I will not go a day without Nature’s Wellness Thyroid Support.
customer_reviews.author: Barbershop

customer_reviews.title: Calmness and Weight Loss
customer_reviews.text: Poor thyroid health is in my family. We have a lot of mental health concerns and trauma in our community, and I have a stressful job on the front lines so I looked into this supplement for some thyroid support. Ashwaghanda has a very calming effect. I had a few family members and coworkers say, “You’re losing weight/you lost weight.” At least 4 ppl. I didn’t notice and I hadn’t necessarily changed my diet or exercise then. But I think it’s this supplement. I’ve recommended it to people because it brought about changes in my mental health (calmness) and weight loss others noticed, less stress.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed Levathorixine, but it gave such chronic all day headaches, after 3 months I said NO! It took another month to get the Levothorixine out of my system and the headaches to go away. As an alternative, I started taking this product. It seems to work, though I haven't had a blood test to check it. I'm starting off with just one pill a day as a test. After a few months of it, it seems to work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lindow

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Well, didn't think it was possible but this stuff actually made me feel much better after a few days. I stopped taking it to see if it was the pills and check my energy and sure enough when I got off them I slowly began to feel tired throughout the day again. I got back on and a few days later I felt good again. Also, it does work very well as a hormone Support too, I'm not sure why, maybe it's mental maybe not but my drive increased while on these... So, overall I'm actually impressed And I'd buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: D. SEGURA

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: This order came very quickly in the mail. The pills are the width of a quarter and dark green. They don't taste like much at all and have no order that I can detect. I've been on them a week and already notice a difference in my increased energy level and better clarity - not much - but a little. Hopefully it will continue to improve. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Eaton603

customer_reviews.title: MAKE ME FEEL GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My metabolism has always been on the slow side so I decided to try "Thyroid Support" to see if I could receive some positive results....and I did! I truly like this supplement!!! It has definitely increased my energy level and my mental clarity. I recommend this product! It's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: terez henriques

customer_reviews.title: Really  a good change for me.
customer_reviews.text: I took this for about ten days and really did not notice any changes. Then I woke up one morning feeling more energetic and wanting to get on with it...whatever it was. Since then I have been feeling less sluggish and more involved. I like it. I changed nothing else so It had to be this supplement for my Thyroid. I will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Bee

customer_reviews.title: A step in the right direction
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this product is amazing. It has really made a difference to my energy levels and maybe given my weightloss a nudge in the right direction. After coming across a review when researching another product - the person had mentioned nodules... I had an ultrasound a few years ago but never really addressed. My levels weren't outside of normal range, so focused on hormones etc. After taking for 1 month have noticed more energy and calmer ie - I'm not flying off the handle as often per my husband :) I'm so happy I tried this!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Feeling exhausted and craving carbs are gone.
customer_reviews.text: My T4 was normal, but I knew my body wasn’t functing correctly. Nature’s Thyroid gave me energy and stopped that sluggish feeling during the day, and made it easier to go to sleep at night. It cut carb craving within three days of being daily use. I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: mscoachbright

customer_reviews.title: Tried for 2 weeks. It really helps my thyroid.
customer_reviews.text: This supplement works. I have been taking 2 tablets daily with my morning breakfast, for the past two weeks. I notice a definite improvement in my energy and cognition, and the swelling in my thyroid has gone away. Important to take in the morning, as I notice restlessness at night if taken late in the day. I'm glad to have a little more slack in eating-for-thyrid, with fewer energy lows than good diet alone.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have hypothyroidism and hashimoto's thyroiditis. I'm on medicine but still struggle with fatigue. I decided to give this a try. I forgot it alot in the beginning and I thought it wasn't helping. I started taking it regularly and felt better after a week. I'm actually going home from work, cooking supper and using my exercise equipment. I've lost 5 pounds. I know its not much but its sure better than gaining. This part may sound strange but my sex drive has increased. I've searched the reviews to see if anyone has experienced this but couldn't find anything. I'm on my second bottle and very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results for Hashimotos
customer_reviews.text: I have Hashimotos and have struggled with fatigue for years. I started taking this supplement a month ago and I can honestly say the change had been phenomenal. I have more energy than I have had in years. It’s wonderful. Also my anxiety has decreased. I feel more at peace throughout the day. As an added bonus I’ve FINALLY managed to start losing weight. It has been so hard for me to even lose one pound since I’ve had Hashimotos even when I follow strict diets and exercise programs. I’ve already lost over 5 pounds since I started taking this! Love this product! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Metcalfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I feel much better taking this along with my levothyroxin prescription. My blood tests have came out good as well, my Dr. hasn't had to change my dosage since I've been taking this supplement. I have more energy and there aren't any side effects. My weight has been the same and sometimes I lose a few pounds here and there. Having hypothyroidism is not fun to have and Thyroid Support Complex has helped with all that comes with low thyroid issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wisberg

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: After taking this for a month , I no longer feel sluggish and tired. I feel more in harmony and have more energy. My thyroid levels were all normal before starting this regime but Maybe the iodine was what I needed for an extra boost of thyroid function since I try to follow a low sodium diet and thus reduced iodine intake which is an important susbstance needed for efficiency of thyroid function. (T3/T4)
customer_reviews.author: ayme torres

customer_reviews.title: Headaches and stomach cramps!
customer_reviews.text: I had such high Hope's for this product when I ordered it based on the great reviews, but I experienced horrible headaches and stomach cramps while taking this. As soon as I discontinued use, these problems went away. I was very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Megan Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my second bottle of this -- I was looking for a comprehensive thyroid supplement that included iodine. I liked that it also included Bladderwrack, as was suggested by Eat Right for Your Blood Type for Type 'O's who are especially prone to thyroid issues. I've already been taking an Ashwagandha supplement separately but I like that I got a few more mgs by taking this supplement. I've already started losing weight and sleeping better! When I ran out for a few days, there was a noticeable difference - more lethargy and water weight retention. I definitely recommend this to anyone with an under active thyroid!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Henry

customer_reviews.title: This product is genuine and authentic, no false advertising here
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had benign, somewhat painful lumps around my thyroid, one is visible in the front, near the throat. Since taking this product, the lumps have diminished and the pain is gone. I also have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Miss V

customer_reviews.title: After only a short time
customer_reviews.text: I have been on Nature-Thyroid for years and back in April I started getting very dizzy after taking it. My doctor seemed indifferent as to what approach to take. I decided to take my own approach and look for a different product. I started looking into different thyroid supplements and after extensive homework I decided on this product. I've only been on it for a short time and already noticed my brain fog seems way better. I'm hoping it helps with the weight gain. I hope to update this review after a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Product works but caused stomach pain and reflux
customer_reviews.text: I struggle to write this review because it helped with many problems this product is prescribed for. My enter your level increased, I slept better at night, had less anxiety, and less fatigue during the afternoon. I have taken thyroid medication for forty plus years with many symptoms still present as other shave also stated. In short the product worked for me but causes severe stomach pain and increase in reflux. I have discontinued product and hoping to find something that does not cause stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: M ellen

customer_reviews.title: A great suplement fo people with hypothyroidism!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with it. I had doubts because of the bad reviews, but with a week I feel much better. I feel more willing to wake up and carry out the day to day activities. I also felt an improvement in my memory and my appetite also diminished. Nothing significant or something super-powerful to lose weight without a diet, however, that anxiety about food has certainly declined. I had no adverse effects either. I only have compliments and praise I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TD Lima

customer_reviews.title: One of the better supplements I've found
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of thyroid/adrenal supplements. I really like the ingredients. So far, I feel great when I take them and haven't noticed any side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sky rocketed my Blood Pressure! Failed.
customer_reviews.text: My blood pressure blew through the roof. Also, I saw no change in my energy levels. I was still sluggish. I wouldnt discourage anyone one with Thyroid issues not to at least try it. It might work for you, just didn't for me. My blood pressure rised to high, dangerous levels. I do not recommend if you have pre-existing blood pressure problems.
customer_reviews.author: written by Tandreia

customer_reviews.title: Increased energy so far.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been taking this for a few weeks but I already notice if I miss a day I don’t feel like I have the same amount of energy. I look forward to seeing if other symptoms are aided by this supplement with continued use as well.
customer_reviews.author: RLH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just started my second bottle and I love it! I have Hashimoto's but since my thyroid levels are still within the normal range, the doctor will not prescribe anything. I wanted to try something all natural and I am definitely feeling much better. I have more energy and can get through the entire day without feeling tired and sluggish. Will definitely continue this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Phipps

customer_reviews.title: results in one day!?
customer_reviews.text: Hypothyroid is a confusing condition to have! Fatigue is daily. I took 2 caps at lunch & did not feel any fatigue! I don't know if that's possible! I do realize the "herbal part" of Thyroid Support may take longer to kick in. I thin I might be very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is a great formula for thyroid remediation
customer_reviews.text: My thyroid levels were very low and I needed to do something about it. SO after a bit of research I decided to try this formula. I haven't seen a doctor yet and have no tests done yet. However I do feel better and some of the symptoms have started to dissipate already. This is a great formulation to try if you want to try and help your thyroid.
customer_reviews.author: Leo S

customer_reviews.title: Great for hor
customer_reviews.text: I started using these after gaining some weight due to getting the birth control implant and some past hormone imbalance and past health issues. I am on my second bottle currently and I have actually lost some weight (along with diet/exercise) and this has helped with my fatigue and other hormone imbalances. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: No Difference
customer_reviews.text: I did not dislike it or like it, it had no affect on my body at all. I did not notice a difference in energy, or health at all. I am no longer taking them simply because why take something you cannot feel, or know it's benefits are occurring. I am 33, 130 lbs, and overall pretty healthy. I wanted it just for stress support, and overall energy support, NOT because I have thyroid issues specifically.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Continue to take regularly
customer_reviews.text: I first tried Thyroid Support for only a week and didn't think it had any effect. After a few weeks I tried the recommended dosage of two tablets and it seemed to have a better effect after 12-14 days. The Thyroid Support seemed to increase my energy and I was able to lower my daily intake of caffeine. Although I don't feel I can replace my prescription Thyroid, this product has been a great enhancement to it, and I'll be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Changed my energy
customer_reviews.text: I am 22 years old with a slow thyroid. I decided to try these and in the past month I saw a change in my energy. I used to wake up with no energy, I’d want to get back into bed and not do anything. Because it felt too exhausting to even think about doing things. After taking these, I have the energy to get up, and stay up. Going to bed doesn’t even cross my mind. It also helped with my mood. I’m less sad, and angry, compared to how I was before. So yes, go ahead and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Roy E.

customer_reviews.title: Don`t buy it
customer_reviews.text: After using this remedy, my head hurt and I had diarrhea. I thought it coincided like that. But no. I checked several times. My head hurt so that I wanted to cry. I had to throw out this muck.
customer_reviews.author: Stanis

customer_reviews.title: Are these even safe to consume?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I’m not sure these are safe to consume. I had one pill, accidentally burped about ten minutes later, and my nostrils burned like they were on fire from chemicals. I bought these because of all the positive reviews on amazon, but dig deeper and saw that these supplements aren’t even sold in other big brand, well respected supplement places. I stopped taking immediately and purchased a different thyroid supplement from elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for energy levels.
customer_reviews.text: After being diagnosed with an "under active" thyroid. I decided to try this. I took this for a month and lost 6 lbs without trying/changing my eating or active level I and had more energy. I forgot to order again and noticed an immediate return of my depression and lethargy. This is a must have for me now!

customer_reviews.title: More energy, better overall mood, excited to see future results while taking the thyroid support.
customer_reviews.text: I do think blood work tests for my thyroid have better results this time. Have a follow up with my doctor soon. I've been taking it for about 3 weeks, and would like to give my body a bit more time on it. But, I do feel like I have a more energy for sure. Also, better overall mood.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for those suffering from Thyroid issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have an under active thyroid. I've had the worst symptoms. I was always super tired and by Thursday's by body could not take more I would need a serious nap once i got home to continue my day. After taking Thyroid Support Formula by Nature's Wellness by focus, energy, is 100%. my appetite has decreased a bit. I am currently taking it with my current Thyroid medication. No side effects. Just great results so far.

customer_reviews.text: I have thyroid and other hormone issues and this product gives me some relief from my symptoms. I sleep better and have more energy throughout the day. Will definitely be purchasing again!!

customer_reviews.title: clarify and sleep better. I've had a decrease in joint pain and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this supplement for a few months and have noticed increased energy, clarify and sleep better. I've had a decrease in joint pain and hair loss too. I suffer from hypothyroidism and have been able to reduce the strength of my medicine. Before taking this product, I was increasing my dosage every year. It has really helped me and I would definitely give it a try.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I took these pills for a week and wont be taking them anymore! The pills kept getting stuck in my throat and after about an hour I would get the worst stomach ache. I felt like I was going to throw up everytime I took it. My belly and hands would swell as well. Needless to say, I'll not be taking this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: brandi williams

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me and I was amazed that Thyroid Support Complex actually does what it says. I've tried other brands with little to no results. I recommend trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I feel like my energy and my moods have been alot better ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like my energy and my moods have been alot better since I began using these. I noticed changes after about a week. I do recommend it to anyone who has thyroid issues and wants to avoid putting prescriptions in their body. I haven't noticed any negative side effects or adverse reactions in the last 4 months I have used them.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking Thyroid Support for the past 2 months and I am feeling fantastic again. Before I was having problems with my energy levels, terrible brain fog, and dealing with fatigue everyday. After taking this supplement I have so much more energy and have started living again!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price. It feel better taking it. And I actually started taking a Thyroid support supplement because it is recommended for issues that cause thinning hair. It has helped give me more energy as well.
customer_reviews.author: George Paul

customer_reviews.title: It would probably be even better if I remembered to take it every day
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with all of the symptoms of thyroid problems but after having all the bloodworm done was told that my levels were within normal limits. Since I was feeling tired all the time and hardly had any energy I went online searching for something to help. I was skeptical of whether or not this would help but after taking it almost every day for a month I can say it definitely gives me more energy. It would probably be even better if I remembered to take it every day! But I can tell on the days that I forget that I am dragging more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Side effects: Acne & Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I read all the good reviews on this product so I decided to give it a try! 3 weeks on this product and I was having bad breakouts and headaches. As soon as I stopped taking it my skin cleared up and my headaches went away.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feeling a bit more peppy, and menopausal weight gain is slowly coming off!

customer_reviews.title: I wished I found this supplement earlier....
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered twice and I will continue to do so. I have an underactive thyroid and this supplement really works for me! I have have so much more energy and I have lost the weight I needed for my wedding. Of course this is accompanied by a healthy diet and exercise but this supplement has made it easier. Thank you Nature Wellnes!

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of Scared about taking them because I am allergic to Kelp, but they are great. I have a cough that I have been fighting with for years and the doctors don't know why. This supplement has actually been helping. I didn't buy this supplement for the cough but it seems to help
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Granillo

customer_reviews.title: Increased energy level and sleeping better too
customer_reviews.text: Love this ....I told my doctor for years that something was up with my thyroid but all the tests were supposedly negative....I started this on my own and can tell a big difference in my energy level and concentration....only been a month but am continuing ....
customer_reviews.author: MaryL

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better already
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this supplement alongside my thyroid medicine Armour Thyroid. I have struggled with maintaining my weight and felt this may help. I read the reviews and will provide an update once I have been taking this a bit longer. So far it’s easy to take and no odor. I take it with a meal.. usually dinner. I did notice that I’m sleeping better at night!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Extra energy
customer_reviews.text: Just got the delivery yesterday, I started taking them today I can honestly say I did feel more energy, I was not expecting a burp of cayenne pepper, lol. Great product though
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered from thyroid problems for a while and even though I take prescription medications for it there are still symptoms. However with this supplement I have more energy. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Great supplemental support for your thyroid

At this along with great probiotics each day and apple cider vinegar after each meal and you will be on your way to Healing

After about two months of taking them, I noticed I had started losing weight. After three months, I had lot eight lbs total and was back to my target weight! I'm so happy to be back to normal and feeling good about myself again!

I'm waking up earlier but feel as though I got the same amount of sleep and I have more energy. I take this while on a Keto diet and it helps me steadily loose weight without it stalling. I will continue to buy this product.

Noticeable difference in my energy within the first week.

I no longer feel fatigue and now has more energy than before. PS I’ve attached a photo of Super B bottle and pill in comparison to the size of the Thyroid Support.

With proper diet & exercise I am losing weight and inches, which I wasn't able to do in the past, since I have PCOS, it's very tough to lose weight. I'm so excited that it's helping me! Thank you!

I have purchased 2 bottles and am on my 3rd. I feel like I need to give it a fair chance, still hoping that it will help with the weight gain.
customer_reviews.author: debbie mcklnlay

customer_reviews.title: Try it out!
customer_reviews.text: I always felt sluggish, tired and was gaining weight and losing my hair since having a baby. Since I started taking this supplement I feel a lot more energy but I have also been losing weight. My hair issue is getting better. Helps my nails as well. Over all good a supplement to take.
customer_reviews.author: L.Tex

customer_reviews.title: I'm feeling hopeful that this product is not an allergen in my system.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tine taking this product, but because I have so many allergies to foods and medicines, and because I've had a very bad reaction while newly taking a thyroid medication (synthetic type), I've decided to give this product a try... I'm not certain, but for now, it's seems not to be causing me any distress.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine M.

customer_reviews.title: It woked for me. No jitters, more energy, better rest and better mood. Good price too.

I also stopped needing naps during the day and started sleeping again at night. My husband even said he was glad to see me smiling more.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has all of the additional ingredients like B-12, magnesium, zinc etc. But what I don't like is the tiny amount of iodine (100mcg or .1mg). I know it says 100% DV but another product I have taken has 5mg and 7.5 of iodide! Plus it's expensive. There are only 30 servings in a bottle and I think it's like $18? Ugh. Sorry that this review is not that good.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rhodes-Rice

customer_reviews.title: My physician recommended these supplements -- I like them in one pill together
customer_reviews.text: Thyroid support -- my physician told me to get a few supplements to help with my thyroid and this brand put them all in the same pill. Easy. Convenient. Cheaper. I have purchased 3 times now and will continue.

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have just started taking this supplement and noticed it gives me more energy which I really needed. Pills are easy to swallow but I suggest taking it with lots of water to wash down easily. I am hoping for some weightloss with this as well! That is to be seen. Overall a good product!

customer_reviews.title: Best for low thyroid
customer_reviews.text: The best natural alternative I have found for low thyroid. While the lab numbers (TSH) are low, I have ZERO symptoms (typical weight gain, fatigue, hair falling out, etc, moody-ness). I have been living like this for 15 years. :)

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take long and I could tell an huge difference in how I felt. I'm 63 and the thyroid medication doesn't make you feel like this my energy has increased so much that the people I work with noticed it within the first few days. My appetite is what it was 20 years ago. I feel fantastic!!!!! Will keep you posted if I have lost any weight and if this continues Thank you
customer_reviews.author: De

I've been having trouble loosing weight and now with light diet and exercise I'm starting to loose pounds! I'm excited to continue taking this and see the improvements to my health!

customer_reviews.title: The suggested dose is two tablets. I take one ...
customer_reviews.text: The suggested dose is two tablets. I take one in the morning and one in the afternoon to keep my energy levels balanced. The product helps my sluggish metabolism and my hypothyroid issues without "fake" ingredients or fillers.

customer_reviews.title: Helped with fatigue
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended to me by my NP because I was having low energy and felt tired easily. After taking this for a couple weeks I started to feel stronger and didn’t fatigue as easily + had less brain fog.

customer_reviews.title: MAJOR Gastrointestinal Issues. Had to stop taking.
customer_reviews.text: This gave me MAJOR gastrointestinal issues. As in, from the very first dose. I am not sure what ingredient or ingredients are causing the issues but I had to stop taking them. I at least have a backup laxative!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good contents at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My doctor suggested I take iodine and selenium supplements to help with my hormone levels. I enjoy the contents of this at the price. I was a little put off at the dark color of the capsules but I don't think it's anything to be concerned with. I don't feel any change yet but some of these adjustments happen over a long time of use and I've only used this for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sunkissed

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss
customer_reviews.text: After taking the thyroid support, I noticed that it seemed easier to take off a few pounds. After finishing my bottle and being without it for awhile, the weight has returned. I'm anxious to try it again and see if I obtain the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I'm thankful I took a chance
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is fast acting capsules vs. Poor tasting pills, it dissolves easily which is also a benefit. I have noticed my appetite has decreased, my brain fog is less and it helps me not need an afternoon nap all the time, that's a first for me! I highly recommend if you're like me, you've had the thyroid tests but they are always negative, you're always tired for no reason and you struggle to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: _mrsoriley

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if this would really work, but so far it's been great and making me feel better. Not just mentally, but feeling better and my appetite is not snacky or craving crappy food, and it's so easy to eat that stuff while working from home. I'm hoping after some blood work with my Dr he'll say something about my blood work being better, too. I'll keep using it though, since it's not giving me any side effects that are negative or noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: SBWarmuth

product_meta.title: Thyroid Support Complex With Iodine For Energy Levels, Weight Loss, Metabolism, Fatigue & Brain Function - Natural Health Supplement Formula: L-Tyrosine, Selenium, Kelp, Bladderwrack, Ashwagandha, etc
feature_bullets: ENERGY BOOST - A natural energy supplement that supports relief of symptoms common to hypothyroidism and slowed thyroid metabolism, including weight gain, puffiness and brain fatigue. These energy vitamins or energy supplements will give your thyroid gland the nutrients it desires, helping you to stay energized and concentrated throughout the day!

METABOLISM BOOSTER FOR WEIGHT LOSS – Correcting thyroid functions can result in weight loss, improved energy, and reduction of daily fatigue. Our thyroid support supplement acts a natural metabolism booster for women and men supporting an increased immune system, energy and weight loss.

NATURAL FORMULA – Our formula contains an all-natural blend of vitamins, minerals, herbs and amino acids thought essential for thyroid hormone production such as Vitamin B-12, iodine, magnesium, zinc, copper, manganese, molybdenum, l-tyrosine, schizandra, ashwagandha root, bladderwrack, kelp, cayenne pepper, plus selenium 100 mcg.

MADE IN THE USA: Rigorously tested for your safety, meets all relevant guidelines for quality; specially formulated for rapid absorption. Manufactured to the highest standards in an approved, GMP compliant facility with no artificial ingredients | 60 Capsules per Bottle

LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – Try it RISK-FREE NOW! Don't like it? Send it back at no cost to you. At Nature’s Wellness, we understand that there are countless factors that play vital roles in the effectiveness of supplements. If for whatever reason you feel our products do not meet your desired effects, simply contact us and we’ll gladly provide you with a full refund on your first bottle. No questions asked, and no need to return the bottle.
